phases

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • phases.Phase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildPhase, PlanningPhase, RetreatPhase

    public abstract class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for defining different Phases of the game.
